name: Smash Racing.
description:
Choose your favorite car, grab some money and head off on an endless race away from your pursuers. Use various bonuses and perks to keep the cops from catching you!

Features:
- wide selection of cars, each with unique perks and features
- varied locations: from familiar parking lots to mysterious deserts
- 7 general bonuses
- 5 generated biomes
- difficult and exciting missions
- endless fun

This and much more awaits you in Smash Racing!
